name: ont-selfscreen-auto
description: Automate the shitty ontario self-screening green check. Send it to a discord channel

scripts.start: npm run-s build && tsc && node dist/index.js
scripts.build: echo "Updating packages, Deleting dist/ and re-compiling" && npm install && rimraf dist/ && tsc
scripts.rebuild: echo "Deleting dist/ and re-compiling" && rimraf dist/ && tsc

author: Elfshot
